title: BEST Movie of the Year?!?! The Green Knight Review
description:
Go to http://fahertybrand.com and use code MORNING at checkout to get 20% of all your summer gear.

The homies Kris Anka and Matt Rorabeck join Tim and Kevin to discuss all of their complicated thoughts on The Green Knight and talk about what they think the best movie of the year so far is.
